external_games.name: Idle Business Tycoon - Build Simulator - Expansion Pack 2

name: Idle Business Tycoon: Build Simulator - Expansion Pack 2
summary: Expand and grow! The possibilities are plenty in Idle Business Tycoon - Build Simulator - Expansion Pack 2. Earn money to unlock new establishments and expand your business all over town. The more you build, the more money you make!
